New Records: Tanner Bibee gave up five earned runs on eight hits, including three solo home runs.
Key Match Events: Bo Naylor hit a solo home run, setting the stage for Cleveland to take the lead.
Andres Gimenez made a spectacular catch in the top of the eighth inning and stole a hit from Freddy Fermin.
Jhonkensy Noel hit a base hit to right field, scoring the go-ahead run.
Post-Match Reflections: Tanner Bibee fought back in the game and the offense came through late in the game for Cleveland to get the victory.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cleveland Guardians salvaged one game from their four-game series with the Kansas City Royals with a 7-5 victory.
Others: The Guardians play their best baseball when they're manufacturing runs and supplementing that with some homers.
